selectLocalByPerson: SELECT pp.na_person, lc.de_local, rt.de_route, st.na_street FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person WHERE pp.na_person = '%$1%'
selectAllLocalByUser: SELECT lc.de_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person INNER JOIN security.user us ON us.id_person = pp.id_person
selectOneLocalByUser: SELECT lc.de_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person INNER JOIN security.user us ON us.id_person = pp.id_person WHERE us.na_user = $1
selectOneRouteByUser: SELECT rt.de_route FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person INNER JOIN security.user us ON us.id_person = pp.id_person WHERE us.na_user = $1
selectLocalByRoute: SELECT pn.na_person, pn.ln_person, lc.na_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN person.person pn ON pn.id_person = pl.id_person WHERE rt.id_route = $1
selectRouteByLocal: SELECT rt.de_route, st.na_street, mp.na_municipality FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN local.local lc ON lc.id_route = rt.id_route INNER JOIN local.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN local.municipality mp ON mp.id_municipality = st.id_municipality WHERE lc.na_local LIKE '%$1%'
selectAllLocal: SELECT lc.id_local, lc.de_local FROM local.local lc
selectAllRoute: SELECT rt.id_route, rt.de_route FROM local.route rt
selectAllRouteAndLocal: SELECT lc.na_local, rt.de_route FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN local.local lc ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route
deleteRoute: DELETE FROM local.route WHERE id_route = $1 RETURNING id_route
deleteLocal: DELETE FROM local.local WHERE id_local = $1 RETURNING id_local
updateLocal: UPDATE local.local SET na_local = $2 WHERE id_local = $1
updateRoute: UPDATE local.route SET de_route = $2 WHERE id_route = $1
